Package uk.co.optimisticpanda.gtest.dto.condition

Interface Summary
ICondition A check to see if a rule should fire or not
 

Class Summary
CombinedCondition This condition wraps multiple conditions and returns the combined effects of its ICondition.isValid(int, Object) methods.
IndexCondition A Condition that returns true on if the dto is at a specified index
NotCondition This condition wraps an ICondition and returns the negation of its ICondition.isValid(int, Object) method.
NthPlaceCondition A condition that returns true on every nth item.
ValueEqualsCondition A Condition that is true based on the value of a property on the passed in dto.
 

Enum Summary
AlwaysCondition A Condition that returns true in all cases.
CombinedCondition.BoolOp An enum that is used to determine how the effects of the conditions are combined.
EvenOddCondition A Condition that returns true on odd or even indexes
